duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the company's annual close process, ensuring accurate financial reporting, and maintaining compliance with accounting standards and regulations.
Lead a team of accounting professionals, collaborating with cross-functional departments to support the company's growth and strategic objectives.
Assist with the oversight and management of the month-end, quarter-end, annual close and financial reporting procedures.
Analyze monthly account information and activity related to revenue, equity, and compensation and benefits.
Provide support and training to Corporate Accounting team.
Support preparation of monthly internal management and external reporting packages.
Support process improvements across the accounting/finance department.
Design and implement accounting procedures that maintain strong internal controls and compliance with regulatory requirements.
Support external audits by working with external auditors.
Research and advise on US GAAP Accounting Standards and how to apply to the Company.
Draft position papers related to implementation of US GAAP Accounting Standards.
Maintain and develop relationship with internal and external parties of the Company.
Train and supervise senior accountants and staff accountants.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, or a bachelor’s degree in another field coupled with a Certified Public Accountant (CPA) designation.
